={{ {
  "query": $('Extract Parameters').first().json.query,
  "sources": ["5movierulz.villas", "ibomma.foo"],
  "results": [
    ...$('Column Structure').all().map(movie => ({
      "title": movie.json.title,
      "url": movie.json.url,
      "source": movie.json.source,
      "year": movie.json.year,
      "poster": movie.json.poster,
      "quality": movie.json.quality,
      "language": movie.json.language,
      "streamingUrls": movie.json.streamingUrls,
      "rank": movie.json.rank
    })),
    ...$('Parse Ibomma').all().map(movie => ({
      "title": movie.json.title,
      "url": movie.json.url,
      "source": movie.json.source,
      "year": movie.json.year,
      "poster": movie.json.poster,
      "quality": movie.json.quality || "",
      "language": movie.json.language,
      "streamingUrls": movie.json.streamingUrls || [],
      "rank": movie.json.rank
    }))
  ]
} }}

parameters.pythonCode:
import requests
import subprocess
import sys
import os

# Get the movie data from the previous node
movie_url = _input.first()['json']['movieUrl']
title = _input.first()['json']['title']
output_filename = _input.first()['json']['outputFileName']

print(f"Starting download for: {title}")
print(f"URL: {movie_url}")
print(f"Output: {output_filename}")

# Download the Python script from GitHub
script_url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vamsi061/Movie-search-n8n/main/scripts/simple_video_extractor.py'
response = requests.get(script_url)

if response.status_code == 200:
    # Save the script to a temporary file
    script_path = '/tmp/simple_video_extractor.py'
    with open(script_path, 'w') as f:
        f.write(response.text)
    
    print("Script downloaded successfully")
    
    # Execute the script
    try:
        result = subprocess.run([
            sys.executable, script_path, 
            movie_url, 
            '--download', 
            '--output', output_filename
        ], capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=300)
        
        stdout = result.stdout
        stderr = result.stderr
        exit_code = result.returncode
        
        print(f"Script execution completed with exit code: {exit_code}")
        print(f"STDOUT: {stdout}")
        if stderr:
            print(f"STDERR: {stderr}")
        
        return {
            'status': 'completed' if exit_code == 0 else 'error',
            'exit_code': exit_code,
            'stdout': stdout,
            'stderr': stderr,
            'movie_url': movie_url,
            'title': title,
            'output_filename': output_filename
        }
        
    except subprocess.TimeoutExpired:
        return {
            'status': 'error',
            'message': 'Download timeout after 5 minutes',
            'movie_url': movie_url,
            'title': title
        }
    except Exception as e:
        return {
            'status': 'error',
            'message': f'Execution error: {str(e)}',
            'movie_url': movie_url,
            'title': title
        }
else:
    return {
        'status': 'error',
        'message': f'Failed to download script from GitHub: {response.status_code}',
        'movie_url': movie_url,
        'title': title
    }
